known limitations ::

1. Because of my understanding on enums in nim, all nim enums are serialized and deserialized as string valued enums. So non string valued enums are not supported. Keep this in mind when interfacing with bcs libraries from other languages

serializeArray, serializeHashTable and serializeOption are made to be templates to allow for them to call custom serializeT : HexString

Imports

constants, largeints, hex

    forbids: [].}

    tags: [], forbids: [].}

    forbids: [].}
